scripts.upload: python3 increment_version.py && rm -rf dist/ botasaurus_server.egg-info  MANIFEST && python3 setup.py sdist && python3 -m pip install -e . && python3 -m twine upload dist/* --verbose
scripts.install: rm -rf dist/ botasaurus_server.egg-info  MANIFEST && python3 setup.py sdist && python3 -m pip install -e .
